item.title: Best at Clash Royal
item.description: Intro I have been playing this game for about two years, and I really LOVE this game! I feel I should do something and share my experience to the community and help others getting better at this game. I’m not a professional player and here I have are all based on my personal experience and opinion. Hopefully this blog can be helpful. ðŸ˜Š Basics 1. Understanding the rules of the game First thing to know is understand the game.
